statements: SELECT * FROM customer_referrals ORDER BY referral_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT referral_id, customer_id, referred_customer_id FROM customer_referrals WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT * FROM customer_referrals ORDER BY reward_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_referrals FROM customer_referrals GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT referral_id, referral_date, reward_amount FROM customer_referrals WHERE referral_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY referral_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_referrals WHERE referral_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, referred_customer_id, referral_date FROM customer_referrals WHERE reward_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(reward_amount) AS avg_reward FROM customer_referrals GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_referrals WHERE referral_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY reward_amount ASC;
SELECT referral_id, customer_id, referred_customer_id, reward_amount FROM customer_referrals WHERE customer_id = 5 AND referred_customer_id = 10;
SELECT referral_id, customer_id, referred_customer_id, referral_date FROM referrals;
SELECT customer_id, referral_date, referred_customer_id, referral_id FROM referrals;
SELECT referral_date, customer_id, referral_id, referred_customer_id FROM referrals;
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT customer_id, reward_amount, reward_date FROM rewards;
SELECT referral_id, customer_id, referred_customer_id, referral_date FROM referrals WHERE referral_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_amount DESC, reward_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(referred_customer_id) AS total_referrals FROM referrals GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT r.customer_id, SUM(r.reward_amount) AS total_rewards FROM rewards r JOIN referrals ref ON r.customer_id = ref.customer_id GROUP BY r.customer_id;
SELECT r.*, COUNT(referral_id) AS total_referrals FROM rewards r JOIN referrals ref ON r.customer_id = ref.customer_id GROUP BY r.customer_id, r.reward_id, r.reward_amount, r.reward_date;
SELECT * FROM referrals;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT referral_date, referral_status FROM referrals WHERE referral_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 50;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT referral_id, referral_date FROM referrals WHERE referral_status = 'approved';
SELECT reward_name, reward_points, reward_description FROM rewards WHERE reward_points >= 50;
SELECT customers.customer_name, rewards.reward_name FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.referral_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE referral_code = 'ABC123';
SELECT referral_id, referrer_id, referee_id, referral_date FROM referrals ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_description, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM referrals LIMIT 5;
SELECT referral_id, referrer_id, referee_id FROM referrals WHERE referral_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customers.customer_name, rewards.reward_name FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT referrer_id, COUNT(referral_id) AS total_referrals FROM referrals GROUP BY referrer_id ORDER BY total_referrals DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, referrals.referral_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN referrals ON customers.customer_id = referrals.referrer_id;
SELECT * FROM referrals;
SELECT customer_id, referred_customer_id FROM referrals WHERE referral_status = 'active';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, reward_amount FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount > 100.00;
SELECT referral_id, customer_id, referred_customer_id, referral_date, referral_status FROM referrals WHERE referral_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT r.customer_id, c.customer_name, r.reward_date, r.reward_amount FROM rewards r JOIN customers c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE r.reward_amount > 100 ORDER BY r.reward_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_rewards FROM rewards GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5;
SELECT l.program_id, l.program_name, COUNT(r.reward_id) AS total_rewards FROM loyalty_program l LEFT JOIN rewards r ON l.program_id = r.customer_id GROUP BY l.program_id ORDER BY total_rewards DESC;
